message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SE 

This paper discusses a novel approach towards fulfilling the demanding requirements of OLTP database systems. It proposes a relational actor programming model for in-memory databases, which is a holistic approach towards fulfilling these challenging requirements. The paper discusses the design of ReactDB, a system design exposing reactors that allows for flexible virtualization of database architecture. Therefore, this paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 

- cs.DB (Database) - as the paper proposes a new approach towards fulfilling the requirements of OLTP database systems. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - as the paper discusses the intra-transaction parallelism and state encapsulation in their applications to reduce latency and improve locality. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) - as the paper proposes a relational actor programming model for in-memory databases. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - as the paper discusses the design of ReactDB, a system design exposing reactors that allows for flexible virtualization of database architecture. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) - as the paper proposes a new approach towards fulfilling the challenging requirements of OLTP database systems.
